name: Feedly: High contrast Google Reader clone
description:
Mimics Google Reader. 

* Higher contrast font colours
* White, black, and blue colour scheme
* Articles span the full width of the window
* Regular width Helvetica/Arial (gets rid of Helvetica Condensed)
additional_info:
Works best with the white (or light) Feedly theme.


***
2014.01.18: updated entry title, website button, entrylists
2013.07.10: minor refinements
2013.07.07: added responsive views.
Released 2013.07.06.
***
